com.neebal.android.simplyreliable.queues

Class InternalMsgQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neebal.android.simplyreliable.queues.InternalMsgQueue

  • public class InternalMsgQueue
extends Object
    Represents a queue that is used by the internal msg queue consumer runnable thread
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Neebal Technologies

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STATE_RECOVERY
      it is in the recovery phase where it is processing the out messages retrieved from the persistent store, adding them to the outbound queue and sending them to the server
      static int STATE_RUNNING_LOCAL_CONNECTION_DOWNED
      represents a state of the internal thread when the local connection is downed
      static int STATE_RUNNING_NORMAL
      represents normal state where the internal thread should process the messages based on the message execution rules
      static int STATE_RUNNING_SERVER_DOWNED
      represents a state of the internal thread when the local connection is up, but the server and Internet are found not working.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMsgAcquiringLock(InternalMessage internalMessage)
      add an InternalMessage instance to the queue by first acquiring the lock
      void addMsgWithoutLock(InternalMessage internalMessage)
      Adds passed internalMessage in to queue without acquiring lock on the queue.
      Condition getCondition() 
      static InternalMsgQueue getInstance() 
      Lock getLock() 
      InternalMessage getMsg()
      Removes the object at the top (0th position) from this queue if it is not empty.
      boolean isEmpty()

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static InternalMsgQueue getInstance()
        Returns:
        a reference to the singleton instance of the InternalMsgQueue

      • getLock

        public Lock getLock()
        Returns:
        a lock of this InternalMsgQueue instance

      • getCondition

        public Condition getCondition()
        Returns:
        a condition on the lock got from the InternalMsgQueue instance

      • addMsgAcquiringLock

        public void addMsgAcquiringLock(InternalMessage internalMessage)
        add an InternalMessage instance to the queue by first acquiring the lock
        Parameters:
        internalMessage - the internal message that needs to be added to the queue only if the lock is free

      • addMsgWithoutLock

        public void addMsgWithoutLock(InternalMessage internalMessage)
        Adds passed internalMessage in to queue without acquiring lock on the queue.
        Parameters:
        internalMessage - the internal message that needs to be added to the queue

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating whether the internal message queue is empty or no

      • getMsg

        public InternalMessage getMsg()
        Removes the object at the top (0th position) from this queue if it is not empty.
        Returns:
        the removed object if queue is not empty; otherwise returns null.
